entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Q: After SDK update and workload update, microsoft.net.sdk.maui is not 8.0.92 #25333
  • .NET 9 GA Reviewing Localization PRs for Backporting #25328
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • .NET9 GA Backport Tracking #25327
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Update CV2 on NET9.0 GA #25325
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • WebAuthenticator Redirect URI Issue Using OAuth 2.0 Client IDs #25323
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `maui/release/8.0.1xx-rc2.2` can't be mirrored to Azdo fast forward branch #25322
  • RC2 : Maui App failed to build with XamlC error : Object reference not set to an instance of an object. #25309
  • About the maui problem with 2147942405 (0x800700005) #25308

Closed

  • Picker on windows shows "Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Picker" if ItemsSource has an empty string #8845
    Backlog
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `maui/release/8.0.1xx-rc2.2` can't be mirrored to Azdo fast forward branch #25321
  • Label or Place holder value is not given for edit fields present on New recipe page: A11y_.NET Core_RecipesAppHomeScreen_New Recipe_AI4MAC #22906
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Compiled bindings should support MultiBindings #5342
    Backlog
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `maui/release/8.0.1xx-rc2.2` can't be mirrored to Azdo fast forward branch #25290
    Backlog
  • How to draw a line or create any image #25310
  • [XC] DataType Not Inherited By MultiBinding #25306
  • Invalid generic instantiation #24951

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0.1xx] Build arcade net9 on GA branch #25336
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Work on UI tests #25335
  • Update .NET MAUI template with .NET 9 hovercraft bot 🤖 #25334
    area-templates
  • [net9.0] Run device tests arm #25331
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Add services.AddHybridWebViewDeveloperTools() extension to enable browser dev tools #25330
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [XC] Fix passing message arguments to BuildException when logging warning as error #25326
  • Revert PR #23052 behavior under new app context switch #25324
    do-not-merge, community ✨, .NET 8 SR10
  • Fix for picker on hidden page opens after back navigation in Android #25319
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • Move ControlGallery XF tests to subfolder #25317
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests, testing-reenable
  • [Testing] Implement Pinch gestures in UITest extensions methods #25316
    area-testing
  • Fix SafeArea adjustments #25315
    area-layout, community ✨
  • [Testing] Implement QueryUntilPresent method to UITest extension methods #25314
    area-testing
  • [Testing] Implement Pan method to UITest extension methods #25312
    area-testing
  • Fixed [Windows] TapGestureRecognizer not working on Entry #25311
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-entry, area-gestures

Merged

  • [release/9.0.1xx] [net9.0] Disable NSToolbar Tabs #25289
  • Update templates for non-VS IDE hosts #25303
    area-templates, community ✨
  • [Windows] - Picker on windows shows "Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Picker" if ItemsSource has an empty string #24276
    community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Update rtm #25332
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Update to rtm and arcade net9 #25279
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [X] inherit DataType based on attribute #25173
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [Testing] Implement TouchAndHoldCoordinates method to UITests extension methods #25313
    area-testing
  • [Documentation] Fix TitleBar comment mistake #25243
    area-docs
  • [release/9.0.1xx] LEGO: Pull request from lego/hb_7241b85a-f216-4d55-a9fa-d8030c736df5_20241015192031750 to net9.0 #25320
  • [ci] Try skip install android stuff on handlers build #25293
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Match Catalyst Template to iOS for Shell Flyout Items #25269
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • LEGO: Pull request from lego/hb_7241b85a-f216-4d55-a9fa-d8030c736df5_20241015192031750 to net9.0 #25299
  • Backport WinAppSDK 1.6 bump to NET9 release #25294
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Update bug-report.yml with .NET 8 SR 9.2 #25305

Updated

  • HybridWebView: Invoke .NET methods from JavaScript #25077
    area-controls-hybridwebview, .NET 9.0 GA
  • Increment build targets to iOS 18 #25140
    do-not-merge, .NET 8 SR10
  • [Mac Catalyst] Set window dimensions #24001
    community ✨
  • Source Generation for XAML #24865
    area-xaml
  • Initialize ResourceDictionaryHelpers.SetAndLoadSource when XAML Hot Reload is enabled #25304
    area-tooling
  • [android] Fallback to default icons in SearchHandler #25067
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Fix [Android] Image AspectFill is not honored #25072
    platform/android 🤖, area-image, community ✨
  • Relative layout content disappeared when Relative layout has the border with border stroke element. #24841
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Fix for unable to select a tab after backing out of a page and returning. #25011
    platform/windows 🪟, area-navigation, community ✨
  • CollectionView, the footer moves to the bottom of the page when the empty view or empty view template is enabled #24997
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Android] Fix app crash caused by dynamic template switching in ListView #24808
    community ✨
  • Fix for Frame PanGestureRecognizer is not working in Android #25239
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-gestures
  • [iOS] Ensure disconnected ItemsViewHandler doesn't hold onto the items source #24610
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Fix for MenuFlyoutItem stops working after navigating away from and back to page #25170
    community ✨
  • Entry Height gets updated when loaded inside the RoundRectangle Shape #25166
    community ✨
  • [net9.0] Merge main net9.0 #25252
  • [UITesting, Catalyst] Fixed DragAndDropUITests to be more reliable #25146
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Android] MediaPicker: Use New Photo Picker #24027
    area-essentials, community ✨
